summary: The diff adds a new public About/Onboarding page and exposes it from the main UI for signed-out users, and it appears to add DMC Technologies attribution in the global layout/footer while keeping existing branding links. However, the evidence provided is truncated, so some acceptance-criteria details (notably link target/rel attributes) cannot be fully verified from the diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: About/Onboarding attribution link to https://www.dmc-technologies.fr opens in a new tab and uses rel="noopener noreferrer".
missing_requirements.reason: The AboutPage content is truncated before any attribution/link markup is shown, so there is no explicit evidence that the DMC Technologies link includes target="_blank" and rel="noopener noreferrer".

missing_requirements.requirement: Footer attribution link to https://www.dmc-technologies.fr is present and (if opening externally) uses appropriate external-link attributes while preserving existing footer branding links.
missing_requirements.reason: The modified App.tsx is truncated before the footer implementation is visible; the only indication is a secondary summary text, which does not prove exact footer markup/attributes or preservation of existing links.
